title: Book - one letter per page?
content:
Hi Typophiles

I remember a while back I flipped through a book that, as far as I remember, was a small little black book that had one charactaristic letter from a different font per page. Now I really want to find out what the book was called - can anybody help?

Thanks!
author: JulianHansen

comments.content: Thanks for the quick answer! It's actually almost the same idea, but it's unfortunately not the book I was talking about - the book wasn't a calendar, but a series of glyphs starting from a (I think).
